pingPong() - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.components.PingPongPlayer
play the player hit and, if the exchange is not terminated, schedule a call to the same method but on the other player through the two way port after waiting 100 milliseconds; when the first exchange is terminated, start the second by calling the method send to push the ball to the other player.

publishPort(PortI) - Static method in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
publish inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally (this information is used by the connection builder to decide how the connections to that port must be done).

PushControlInboundPort - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.ports
The class PushControlInboundPort implements an inbound port for the interface PushControlI assuming that the component that offers this interface will use the plug-in DataInterfacesPushControlPlugin.
PushControlInboundPort(String, ComponentI) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.ports.PushControlInboundPort
create the inbound port with a automatically generated URI.
PushControlInboundPort(String, String, ComponentI) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.ports.PushControlInboundPort
create the inbound port with a given URI.
